attributes.action: stop negative and damaging body image ideals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Please take action to address the promotion of negative, unhealthy and unrealistic body image ideals in our society, eg-models, high fashion magazines and shop manniquins. While I cannot blame these for "causing" eating disorders, they are definately anti-recovery. 
Please take action,people are dying, self-harming and hating themselves because they are not "perfect".
